sentences.english: Often, they are cold-pressed and extracted from fatty portions of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 常常，他们冷压萃取脂肪和部分蔬菜。

sentences.english: It is mainly extracted by ethanol extract of the finished product obtained Absolute clouds.
sentences.chinese: 本品主要通过乙醇萃取成品的云烟浸膏制得净油。

sentences.english: The unrefined Veratryl alcohol extracted from fresh grape peel by organic solvent could significantly enhance Lip activity.
sentences.chinese: 有机萃取葡萄皮渣粗提藜芦醇可提高酶活。

sentences.english: To definite the optimum experimental condition for microwave extraction red pigment of Baubinia blakeana Dunn flower .

sentences.english: Sea weed extract is neither a rare nor expensive ingredient.

sentences.english: It offers several advantages over conventional dispersion-coalescence-settling solvent extraction processes.
sentences.chinese: 该过程具有一些区别于通常萃取过程的特殊优势。

sentences.english: Extraction technique in binary-water phase system has been widely used in separation and purification of enzyme.
sentences.chinese: 双水相体系萃取技术巳被广泛应用于酶的分离纯化。

sentences.english: Solid-Phase extraction (SPE) is a fast-developing sample preparating technique.
sentences.chinese: 固相萃取是近年来发展较快的样品预处理技术。

sentences.english: Principle and practice for application of extractive technology in extracting gold from copper anode slime are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍萃取技术在铜阴极泥提金中的应用原理和实践。

sentences.english: Supercritical CO2 fluid was used to extract the flavone in Artemisia Selengensis Turcz.

sentences.english: Elixirs are concentrated alcohol extractions that are similar to both teas and tinctures .
sentences.chinese: 长生不老药是浓缩的酒精萃取物，类似于茶和酊剂。

sentences.english: We handle projects in order to accumulate more experience working with diverse technologies.
sentences.chinese: 软体技术与经验就从实作计划中歷練萃取累积的。

sentences.english: ASE extraction efficiency is equivalent to that of Soxhlet extraction.
sentences.chinese: 加速溶剂萃取的提取效率和索氏提取相当。

sentences.english: Naphthalenesulfonic acid type organic wastewater was treated by complex extraction method.
sentences.chinese: 采用络合萃取法对萘磺酸类有机废水进行预处理。

sentences.english: These are derived from wild yams and soybeans.
sentences.chinese: 天然黄体酮萃取自野生山药和豆科植物。

sentences.english: Selections of extractants with their strong and weak points have also been discussed by the author.

definition: best feature/most important part of an object/quintessence/essence/soul
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
